mapper.select: SELECT attendance_no attendanceNo, user_no userNo, checkin_time checkInTime, checkout_time checkOutTime, checkin_sms checkInSMS, checkout_sms checkOutSMS FROM attendance ORDER BY attendance_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance(attendance_no,user_no,checkin_time,checkin_sms) SELECT seq_attendance_no.nextval, user_no userNo, sysdate, 0 FROM users_detail WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
INSERT INTO attendance(attendance_no,user_no,checkout_time,checkout_sms) SELECT seq_attendance_no.nextval, user_no userNo, sysdate, 0 FROM users_detail WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
